name: Carissa Bazler

last_movies.title: Secret Agent Dingledorf and His Trusty Dog Splat

introduction: Carissa Bazler is an award-winning young actress best known for her standout lead roles in Crypt TV's "The Girl in the Woods," "The Door in the Woods," and "The Look-See." Carissa has 8 years of Hollywood acting experience, starring in over 50 film, TV, commercial and web roles. Carissa brings a rare-for-her-age combination of depth and subtle expression to her roles. She captivates audiences with grounded performances and a strong screen presence. Directors have described her as "adorable," "professional," "a joy to work with," and a "natural." Carissa has been playing piano and guitar since age 7. Carissa resides in Los Angeles, California, and she loves sharing the screen with her three sisters Brianna, Isabella, and Sarah.
